Description.Name: Exiled
Description.Details: The day after your sixteenth birthday, you were exiled for an unforgivable transgression.

OptionDescription: Once the promising young scion of your family, you committed an unforgivable transgression and were sentenced to life in exile. You stole away with the family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] and set off to find a new life to call your own. +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]] AMS.
BioDescription: Once the promising young scion of your family, you committed an unforgivable transgression and were sentenced to life in exile. You stole away with the family's ancestral Blackjack and set off to find a new life to call your own.
